IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Read a subset of the data spaced by the stride.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the SpyPlot reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: DownConvertVolumeFraction
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether the type of the volume fraction is float or should be down converted into unsinged char.

IntVectorProperty.name: DistributeFiles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In parallel mode, toggle whether the reader distributes files or blocks.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateLevelArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to generate a cell array storing the level of each block.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateActiveBlockArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to generate a cell array that stores the active status of a block.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateBlockIdArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to generate a cell array storing a unique blockId of each block.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the XMol Molecule reader.

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the .xyz file name for the PLOT3D reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: QFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the .q file name for the PLOT3D reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: BinaryFile
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Is this a binary file?

IntVectorProperty.name: MultiGrid
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Does this file have multiple-block information?

IntVectorProperty.name: HasByteCount
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Does this file use Fortran leading-trailing byte counts?

IntVectorProperty.name: IBlanking
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Is there any visibility information?

IntVectorProperty.name: TwoDimensionalGeometry
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Is the data only two-dimensional?

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceRead
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the file be read even if it appears corrupt?

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the byte order of the binary file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: Functions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which functions (arrays) to compute.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the Phasta reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the STL reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the BYU reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the Gaussian Cube reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the POP Ocean file reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the radius of the dataset.

IntVectorProperty.name: ClipExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the extent of the dataset to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfGhostLevels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of ghost levels to generate.

StringVectorProperty.name: CaseFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the .sos file for the EnSight Master Server reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the byte order of the binary file(s).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SetTimeValue
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the time value to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which point-centered arrays to read.

Documentation.long_help: Read raw regular rectilinear grid data from a file. The dimensions and type of the data must be specified.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePrefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file prefix (directory plus common initial part of file name) for the raw binary uniform rectilinear grid dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the format string to determine the file names necessary for reading this dataset. In creating the filenames, %s will be replaced by the prefix and %d by a digit which represents the slice number in Z.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataScalarType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the pixel or voxel type in the file(s): short, int, float ...

IntVectorProperty.name: DataByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the byte order of the binary file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: FileDimensionality
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the file(s) in this dataset contain slices (2D) or volumes (3D).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataOrigin
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the position of the point with index (0,0,0).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of a voxel in each dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the minimum and maximum index values of the data in each dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfScalarComponents
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of componenets each pixel or voxel has (e.g., RGB - 3 scalar components).

StringVectorProperty.name: ScalarArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a name to assign to the point-centered data array read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the XDMF reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: SetDomainName
StringVectorProperty.label: Domain Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the domain name.

StringVectorProperty.name: SetGridName
StringVectorProperty.label: Grid Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the grid name.

StringVectorProperty.name: EnableGrid
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which grid(s) to enable.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which point-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: Stride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of steps to skip between each point (structured data only).

StringVectorProperty.name: ParameterIndex
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the parameter index.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the Exodus reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: XMLFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the name of an XML file containing part and material descriptions and a mapping to element blocks.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePrefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file root used with the file pattern to format a file name.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the pattern used to load files. There are two parts to it: the prefix (%s) and the file number (%i).

IntVectorProperty.name: FileRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the indices of the first and last files to be read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: SideSetArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Side Set Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the side set arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: NodeSetArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Node Set Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the node set arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisplayType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the display type (blocks = 1, materials = 2, hierarchy = 3).

StringVectorProperty.name: BlockArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Block Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which block arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: MaterialArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Material Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which material arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: HierarchyArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Hierarchy Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose which hierarchy arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateBlockIdCellArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Block Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the reader generates block ids.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateGlobalNodeIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Global Node Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the reader generates global node ids.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateGlobalElementIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Global Element Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the reader generates global element ids.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateFileIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: File Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the reader generates cell-based disk file ids.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExodusModelMetadata
IntVectorProperty.label: Include metadata
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn this option on if you plan to write Exodus or EnSight files.

IntVectorProperty.name: ApplyDisplacements
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select whether the reader automatically applies displacements.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DisplacementMagnitude
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the magnitude of the applied displacement.

IntVectorProperty.name: HasModeShapes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Some simulations overload the Exodus time steps to represent mode shapes. In this case, it does not make sense to iterate over the "time steps", because they are not meant to be played in order. Rather, each represents the vibration at a different "mode." Setting this to 1 changes the semantics of the reader to not report the time steps to downstream filters. By default, this is off, which is the case for most Exodus files.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the AVS UCD reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the Facet reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the Meta Image reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the PNG reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the SESAME reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TableId
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set which table to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the OpenFOAM reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the MFIX reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the FLUENT reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the LSDyna reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: SolidArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Solid Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which solid arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ThickShellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Thick Shell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which thick shell arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ShellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Shell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which shell arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: RigidBodyArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Rigid Body Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which rigid body arrays to load.

StringVectorProperty.name: RoadSurfaceArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Road Surface Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which road surface arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: BeamArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Beam Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which beam arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ParticleArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Particle Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which particle arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PartArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Part Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which part arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DeformedMesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the mesh be deformed over time (if the Deflection node array is set to load)?

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveDeletedCells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should cells that have been deleted (failed structurally, for example) be removed from the mesh?

IntVectorProperty.name: SplitByMaterialId
IntVectorProperty.label: Split by Material Id
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should each material have its own mesh, or should there be one mesh for all materials?

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the CSV (Command Separated Values) reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseStringDelimiter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get whether to use the string delimiter.

IntVectorProperty.name: HaveHeaders
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to treat the first line of the file as headers.

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldDelimiterCharacters
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the characters that will be used to separate fields. For example, set this to "," for a comma-separated value file. Set it to ".:;" for a file where columns can be separated by a period, colon or semicolon. The order of the characters in the string does not matter. Defaults to a comma.
